item.title: 中国重要全会旨在解决数十年来的税收失衡问题
item.description: 政策顾问们表示，长期以来一直被吹嘘的中国税收制度改革将侧重于允许地方政府保留更多的财政收入，市场普遍认为这是消除对金融稳定的直接威胁的重要一步。【原文：Long-touted changes to China's tax system will focus on allowing local governments to retain more fiscal revenues, say policy advisers, widely seen by markets as an important step towards removing an immediate threat to financial stability.】

item.title: 图片报》报道：西门子因缺陷停止向德国交付列车
item.description: 据《图片报》周四报道，由于某些部件存在质量问题，德国企业集团西门子已停止向德国铁路运营商交付新的高速 ICE 列车。【原文：German conglomerate Siemens has stopped delivering new fast-speed ICE trains to rail operator Deutsche Bahn due to quality problems in some components, Bild daily reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟电动汽车调查要求提供的信息 "史无前例
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，欧盟为调查中国新能源汽车所要求的信息种类、范围和数量都是 "前所未有的"。【原文：The types, scope and quantity of information requested by the European Union for the investigation into Chinese new energy vehicles were "unprecedented", China's commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 丰田因零部件短缺停止 6 条生产线
item.description: 丰田汽车公司表示，由于零部件短缺，从周四起将停止日本五家工厂的六条生产线。【原文：Toyota Motor said it would halt six production lines at five plants in Japan from Thursday due to a parts shortage.】

item.title: 花旗集团地区首席执行官表示，尽管政治局势不确定，但花旗仍将赌注押在欧洲
item.description: 花旗集团新任欧洲地区主管伊格纳西奥-古铁雷斯-奥兰蒂亚（Ignacio Gutierrez-Orrantia）在接受路透社采访时表示，尽管欧洲大陆的政治不稳定令投资者感到不安，但花旗集团仍希望促进其在欧洲的业务。【原文：Citigroup is looking to boost its business in Europe despite political instability on the continent spooking investors, the bank's new head of the region Ignacio Gutierrez-Orrantia said in an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 英国大选前英国央行将维持利率在 16 年高位
item.description: 由于潜在通胀压力持续存在，英国央行周四看来将把利率维持在 5.25% 的 16 年高位，这将使首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）无法在 7 月 4 日大选前获得急需的推动力。【原文：Britain's central bank looks on course to hold interest rates at a 16-year high of 5.25% on Thursday as underlying inflation pressures prove persistent, depriving Prime Minister Rishi Sunak of a much-needed boost ahead of a July 4 election.】

item.title: Energean 拟以高达 9.45 亿美元的价格向凯雷出售地中海油气资产
item.description: 这家专注于地中海地区的石油和天然气生产商周四表示，Energean 已同意将其在埃及、意大利和克罗地亚的资产出售给私募股权基金凯雷（Carlyle），出售价格高达 9.45 亿美元。【原文：Energean has agreed to sell its assets in Egypt, Italy and Croatia to private equity fund Carlyle for up to $945 million, the Mediterranean-focused oil and gas producer said on Thursday.】

item.title: 业内人士称，由于德国需求下滑，5 月份欧盟电动汽车销量下降
item.description: 欧洲汽车行业机构周四公布的数据显示，5月份欧盟新电池电动汽车的销量同比下降了12%，其中德国的销量同比下降了30%。【原文：Sales of new battery-electric cars in the European Union dropped 12% in May from a year earlier, led by a 30% plunge in Germany, data from Europe's auto industry body showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 聚焦：欧盟芯片制造计划陷入困境，Wolfspeed 工厂推迟投产
item.description: Wolfspeed 公司推迟了在德国建造一座耗资 30 亿美元的工厂的计划，这凸显了欧盟为提高半导体产量和减少对亚洲芯片的依赖所做的努力。【原文：Wolfspeed has delayed plans to build a $3 billion plant in Germany, highlighting the European Union's struggle to increase semiconductor production and reduce its reliance on Asian chips.】

item.title: 中国的倾销调查是对西班牙猪农应变能力的又一次考验
item.description: 本周，中国对欧盟进口猪肉进行倾销调查，继而对中国电动汽车征收关税，这让西班牙的养猪户们措手不及，但养猪业已经证明了它的韧性，远没有欧盟的汽车业那么脆弱。【原文：China's dumping probe into EU pork imports following duties slapped on Chinese EVs, caught Spain's pig farmers on the hop this week, but the sector has proved it is resilient and far less vulnerable than the bloc's car industry.】

item.title: 腾讯《地下城与勇士》游戏从部分安卓应用商店下架
item.description: 腾讯公司表示，由于其热门手机游戏《地下城与勇士》（DnF Mobile）的合同已到期，该公司将于本周四从部分安卓应用商店下架该游戏。【原文：Tencent is removing from Thursday its hit mobile game "Dungeon & Fighter" (DnF Mobile) from selected Android app stores as its contracts have expired, the company said.】

item.title: 股东警告新日铁收购美国钢铁公司将面临更高的脱碳成本
item.description: 一个激进的股东组织表示，新日铁对美国钢铁公司的拟议收购有可能增加日本第一大钢铁制造商的脱碳成本，并敦促该公司解决收购对其气候目标的影响。【原文：Nippon Steel's proposed acquisition of U.S. Steel risks raising decarbonisation costs for Japan's top steelmaker, an activist shareholder group said, urging the company to address the takeover's impact on its climate goals.】

item.title: 加拿大西捷航空公司称工会撤销罢工通知
item.description: 加拿大西捷航空公司（WestJet）周四表示，在代表其维修工程师的工会撤销罢工通知并表示将重返谈判桌后，该公司正在努力恢复正常运营。【原文：Canadian airline WestJet said on Thursday it is working to resume normal operations after the union representing its maintenance engineers rescinded its strike notice and said it would return to the bargaining table.】

item.title: 瑞士央行称，瑞士信贷倒闭后监管框架仍存在缺陷
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）周四表示，继 2023 年瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）倒闭之后，瑞士金融监管框架的薄弱环节依然存在，必须加以解决。【原文：Weaknesses in the Swiss financial regulatory framework persist following the 2023 collapse of Credit Suisse and must be addressed, the Swiss National Bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞标贝利可能放弃改变利率
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，凯雷、KKR 是 Discover 100 亿美元美国学生贷款组合的头号竞标者
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，私募股权公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc）和 KKR 是美国信用卡发行商 Discover Financial 100 亿美元美国学生贷款组合的热门竞标者。【原文：Private equity firms Carlyle Group Inc and KKR are the top bidders for U.S. credit card issuer Discover Financial's $10 billion U.S. student loan portfolio, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 首次在澳大利亚主要证券交易所上市
item.description: 周四，比特币交易所交易基金（ETF）首次在澳大利亚主要股票市场上市，基金经理们首次推出产品，以满足投资者在价格暴涨后重返加密货币市场的需求。【原文：A bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) launched on Australia's main stock market for the first time on Thursday as fund managers debut products to satisfy investors returning to cryptocurrency markets following a boom in prices.】

item.title: 亚洲股市保持涨势；英国央行成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于交易商在等待更多的美国政策线索，亚洲股市周四在两年来的最高点附近徘徊，得到了喘息的机会，而英镑在英国央行会议前持稳，预计利率将保持不变。【原文：Asian stocks took a breather on Thursday, hovering near their highest in two years as traders waited for more U.S. policy clues, while sterling was steady before a Bank of England meeting where rates are expected to remain unchanged.】

item.title: 英国央行决议前英镑持稳；美元兑日元摇摆不定
item.description: 周四，在英国央行（BOE）稍后做出利率决定之前，英镑基本持稳，美元则在等待新的市场催化剂。【原文：The British pound held broadly steady on Thursday ahead of a rate decision from the Bank of England (BoE) later in the day, while the dollar was on the back foot as it awaited fresh market catalysts.】

item.title: 中国基准利率保持稳定，中国人民银行步履维艰
item.description: 中国周四在月度固定利率会议上维持基准贷款利率不变，符合市场预期。【原文：China left benchmark lending rates unchanged at a monthly fixing on Thursday, in line with market expectations.】

item.title: 布伦特油价因中东战争上涨，而 WTI 油价在库存报告公布前下跌
item.description: 布伦特原油期货在周四早盘交易中上扬，原因是以色列坦克开进了加沙，而美国原油期货则因石油库存膨胀的前景而下跌。【原文：Brent crude futures edged up in early trade on Thursday as Israeli tanks advanced into Gaza, while U.S. crude futures dipped on the prospect of swelling oil inventories.】

item.title: 报告称 2023 年化石燃料使用量和排放量将创历史新高
item.description: 世界能源行业统计回顾报告》周四称，2023 年全球化石燃料消耗量和能源排放量均创下历史新高，尽管化石燃料在全球能源结构中所占的比例同比略有下降。【原文：Global fossil fuel consumption and energy emissions hit all-time highs in 2023, even as fossil fuels' share of the global energy mix decreased slightly on the year, the industry's Statistical Review of World Energy report said on Thursday.】

item.title: 路透社调查发现，大多数日本企业认为没有必要效仿美国对中国征收关税
item.description: 路透社周四的一项调查显示，大多数日本企业认为其政府没有必要效仿美国对中国进口商品加征关税，并称中国工业部门产能过剩对它们没有影响。【原文：Most Japanese companies see no need for their government to follow the U.S. in raising tariffs on Chinese imports, saying excessive production capacity in China's industrial sector does not affect them, a Reuters survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: CDK Global 调查网络事件，短暂关闭所有系统
item.description: 零售技术和软件供应商 CDK Global 周三表示，该公司正在调查一起网络事件，并主动短暂关闭了所有系统。【原文：Retail technology and software provider CDK Global was investigating a cyber incident and had briefly shut down all its systems proactively, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国 5 月税收收入增长 2.6
item.description: 德国财政部周四表示，受一次性基数效应影响，联邦和地区税收收入同比增长2.6%，达到612亿欧元（约合657.7亿美元）。【原文：German federal and regional tax revenues rose 2.6% to 61.2 billion euros ($65.77 billion) in May from the previous year, helped by a one-off base effect that boosted income on the federal level, the finance ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 墨西哥连锁餐厅首次公开募股可能成为澳大利亚市场的转折点
item.description: 在经历了两年的深度冻结之后，澳大利亚投资者将寻找首次公开募股市场解冻的迹象，因为快速增长的墨西哥连锁餐厅 Guzman Y Gomez 将在 11 个月内进行该国最大的首次公开募股。【原文：After two years in deep freeze, Australian investors will be looking for signs the initial public offerings market is thawing as fast-growing Mexican restaurant chain Guzman Y Gomez serves up the country's biggest IPO in 11 months.】

item.title: 早间新闻亚洲股市创两年新高；中国和印尼设定利率
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Consensys 称美国监管机构已结束对以太坊 2.0 的调查
item.description: 加密货币公司 Consensys 周二晚些时候在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，美国证券交易委员会已结束对区块链协议 Ethereum 2.0 的调查。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has closed its investigation into the blockchain protocol Ethereum 2.0, cryptocurrency firm Consensys said in a post on social media platform X late on Tuesday.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 首席科学家将创办一家新的人工智能公司
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 的联合创始人兼前首席科学家伊利亚-苏茨基弗（Ilya Sutskever）周三表示，他正在创办一家新的人工智能公司。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI's co-founder and former chief scientist Ilya Sutskever said on Wednesday that he was starting a new artificial intelligence company.】

item.title: 法航荷航首席执行官就喷气机停机位不足问题抨击巴黎主要机场
item.description: 法航荷航首席执行官敦促巴黎机场公司改善法国首都戴高乐机场，称喷气式飞机跑道短缺导致每天都要争夺飞机停机位，运营成本增加。【原文：Air France-KLM's CEO has urged Aeroports de Paris to improve the French capital's Charles de Gaulle airport, saying a shortage of jetways has created a daily struggle for aircraft parking spaces and higher operating costs.】
